name: Sumo Sorcery
description:
Celebrating 10 years of working with Unity we present: Sumo Sorcery. A remake of our very first Unity game jam project, Sumo Sheep.

This is a small internal project but we just had to put it online for people to enjoy. Play on a single keyboard with a friend or online with up to 8 players and try to become the last sorcerer on the platform.

Eat cupcakes, knock off sorcerers, be a winner.

Sumo Sorcery was made by the following people:

  • Elwin Fransz - Code
  • Karim Baz - Character Art/Animation/SFX
  • Joy Verheijen - Environment Art/UI
  • Roel Ezendam - Code
  • Lex Decrauw - Code
  • Roan Albers - Art Lead
